text.0: what shall we sing to rudra strong most bounteous excellently wise.
text.1: that shall be dearest to his heart.
text.2: that aditi may grant the grace of rudra to our folk our kine.

text.5: yea all the gods with one accord.
text.6: to rudra lord of sacrifice of hymns and balmy medicines.
text.7: we pray for joy and health and strength.
text.8: he shines in splendour like the sun refulgent as bright gold is he.
text.9: the good the best among the gods.
text.10: may he grant health into our steeds wellbeing to our rams and ewes.
text.11: to men to women and to kine.
text.12: o soma set thou upon us the glory of a hundred men.
text.13: the great renown of mighty chiefs.
text.14: let not malignities nor those who trouble soma hinder us.
text.15: indu give us a share of strength.
text.16: soma head central point love these soma know these as serving thee.
text.17: children of thee immortal at the highest place of holy law.
